nodes.text: The Firestone Islands Guards was a security force on the planet Atterra Bravo that Rendal Panzoro was a pilot for. They policed piracy and smuggling. After the First Order blockaded the Atterra system, they impounded the ships used by the planets security forces including some of the Firestone Islands Guards, though the Bravo Rising were able to hide some before they were impounded. The Firestone Island Guards were later brutally and ruthlessly targeted by the First Order.
